failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check or upload installer log for more information
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: MassEffectModderNoGui crashed or returned a non-zero error code during preinstallation scan. Please see installer log for more info.

failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check or upload installer log for more information
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: MassEffectModderNoGui crashed or returned a non-zero error code during unpacking of DLC SFARs. Please see installer log for more info. The game is in an inconsistent state and may not be functional.

failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check or upload installer log for more information
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: MassEffectModderNoGui crashed or returned a non-zero error code during scanning of existing game textures. Please see installer log for more info.

failureinfo.failedtopmessage: Detected incorrectly installed mod or missing dependent DLC
failureinfo.failedbottommessage: A mod is installed incorrectly. Check the installer log for details
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: MassEffectModderNoGui detected an improperly installed mod (e.g. files are not in the correct folder) or a dependent DLC couldn't be found. Check the installer log for more information.

failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check or upload installer log for more information
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: Texture map file is missing - has this game been migrated to a new system or user account?

failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check or upload installer log for more information
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: Texture map file is corrupted and unusable - you will need to delete the game and then reinstall so the texture map can be rebuilt.

failureinfo.failedtopmessage: Files were added after ALOT was installed
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: Installation of package files after ALOT has been installed is unsupported. Please follow the correct installation directions for ALOT.

failureinfo.failedtopmessage: Files were removed after ALOT was installed
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: Removal of package files after ALOT has been installed is unsupported. Please follow the correct installation directions for ALOT.

failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check or upload installer log for more information
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: MassEffectModderNoGui crashed or returned a non-zero error code during installation of textures. Please see installer log for more info. The game is not in a usable state.

failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check or upload installer log for more information
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: MassEffectModderNoGui crashed or returned a non-zero error code during saving of game packages. Please see installer log for more info. The game is not in a usable state.

failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check or upload installer log for more information
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: MassEffectModderNoGui crashed or returned a non-zero error code during removal of empty mipmaps. Please see installer log for more info. The game is in an inconsistent state.

failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check or upload installer log for more information
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: MassEffectModderNoGui crashed or returned a non-zero error code during recompression of game files. Please see installer log for more info. The game is in an inconsistent state.

failureinfo.failedtopmessage: Failed to install remaining ALOT markers
failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check or upload installer log for more information
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: MassEffectModderNoGui crashed or returned a non-zero error code during application of ALOT markers on non-modded files. Please see installer log for more info. The game is in a functional but texture settings and proper markers have not been applied.

failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check or upload installer log for more information
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: MassEffectModderNoGui crashed or returned a non-zero error code after textures were installed, during the texture verification step. Please see installer log for more info.
